entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:13 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:13 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 5:13 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
